titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should exert every effort to schedule annual summit meetings with the leader of the Soviet Union.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

bill.summary: 10/22/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should take all necessary steps to schedule annual summit meetings with the leader of the Soviet Union.
